MAYINGELEJA anji kakwamba ngwo kakulongesa umwenemwene hakutwala kuli Zambi. Alioze chino, hi chamwenemwene ko, mumu kakulongesa yuma yalisa hakutwala ku chize Zambi apwa ni chize twatamba kumuwayila. Kuchi mutuhasa kunyingika jila yize yalita kuwayilamo Zambi? Yehova wika mwe mahasa kutulweza chize twatamba kumuwayila.
2. Kuchi muhasa kunyingika jila yize yalita kuwayilamo Zambi?
2 Yehova hanatwehe Mbimbiliya kashika mutuhasa kunyingika jila yize yalita kumuwayila. Nyi walilongesa Mbimbiliya, Y
... 
tayiza Yesu ngwetu ye jila yize yakutwala kuli Zambi?
11 Twatamba kwononokena Yesu mumu iye ye jila yize yakutwala kuli Zambi. Mbimbiliya yinambe ngwo: “Ulamwino wakuhi muli mukwo niumwe: mumu chipwe jina lieka liakuhi kushi lia lilu, nilimwe, lize hanalihana hakachi ka atu; atulamwine nalio.” (Yilinga 4:12) Mu Kapitulu 5 wa mukanda uno, twalilongesanga ngwetu, Yehova katumine Yesu hanga ahane mwono wenyi ngwe ukuule kuli atu waze akwononoka. (Mateu 20:28) Yehova hanasakula Yesu hanga apwe Mwana
...
masepa ni asoko je waze analimika ni yena ha mukunda wa kuwayila Yehova, kulutwe lia matangwa no mahasa kulilongesa Mbimbiliya.
20. Mumu liaka chili chilemu kuwayila Zambi mu jila yize yalita?
20 Hi kwasala hakehe, Zambi mahwisa upi weswe, nawa Wanangana wenyi uyule hashi eswe. (2 Petulu 3:9, 13) Wano makapwa mashimbu chiseke! Atu eswe makawayila Yehova mu jila yize iye akuzanga hanga tumuwayilemo. Kashika chili chilemu kwehuka uwayilo wa mahuza haliapwila ni kuwayila Zambi mu jila yize yalita..

Kutala Mbimbiliya yinahase kumikafwa muhone kulizakamina tahi?
Kutala namwamba ngwenu?
Eyo
Nduma
Pamo
Vyuma Yahanjika Mbimbiliya
“Mbilenu kulizakamina chenu chosena hali [Kalunga], mwomwo amizakama.” (WaPetulu 1, 5:7) Mbimbiliya yatufwelelesa ngwayo Kalunga nahase kutukafwa mangana tuhone kulizakamina.
Vyuma muka vikwavo natulinangula muMbimbiliya?
Kulomba chinahase kumikafwa mupwenga ‘nakuunda chaKalunga,’ chize cheji kukehesanga kulizakamina.—Wavaka-Fwilipi 4:6, 7.
Kaha nawa kutanganga Mazu aKalunga nachimikafwa mangana muhone kuhomba.—Mateu 11:28-30.
Uno kulizakamina nachikakuma tahi?
Vatu vamwe vafwelela ngwavo . . . vatu vavatenga mangana valizakaminenga nakuhomba, kaha veka ngwavo kulizakamina cheji kukumanga kuvanga kaha nge mutu nafu. Enu mwashinganyeka ngachilihi?
Vyuma yahanjika Mbimbiliya
Kalunga mwakafumisako vyuma vyosena vize vyeji kulingisanga vatu valizakamine. Mbimbiliya yamba ngwayo: “Kufwa kacheshi kukapwako chekako, kaha nawa kakweshi kukapwa cheka kulishona, chipwe miteto, chipwe kukolako.”—Kusoloka 21:4.
Vyuma muka vikwavo natulinangula muMbimbiliya?
MuWangana waKalunga vatu navakatwamanga mukuunda nakupwa vakukingiwa.—Isaya 32:18.
Vatu kaveshi kukalizakamina nakuhomba chekako.—Isaya 65:17.

HIWALILONGESA umwenemwene unji wa mu Mbimbiliya kupalikila mu mukanda uno, ngwe chilakenyo cha Zambi cha mwono wa mutulo, umwenemwene hali afu, ni kutalatala cha uhindukilo. (Chilumbununyi 9:5; Luka 23:43; Yoano 5:28, 29; Usolwelo 21:3, 4) Kota hiwaputuka kukunguluka ni Yela ja Yehova, ni kufuliela ngwe ayo kali mu uwayilo wamwenemwene. (Yoano 13:35) Kota hiwapwa ni usepa upema ni Yehova, nawa kota hiwakwata chiyulo cha kumuwayila. Kashika muhasa kunyonga ngwe, ‘Yika natamba kulinga hanga ngulin
... 
 milonga yenu yikajimuke.” (Yilinga 3:19) Kulikonyeka yika chinalumbunuka? Chinalumbunuka kwivwa chinyengo ha yuma yipi yize twakulinga. Chakutalilaho, nyi te wakulinga utanji, watamba kulikonyeka. Nawa chipwe ngwe ku mwono we weswe wakusa tachi hanga ulinge yuma yize yalita, nihindu watamba kununga ni kulikonyeka, mumu yetweswe tuli akwa-shili nawa twakwita kuli Zambi hanga atukonekene.—A-Roma 3:23; 5:1.
13. ‘Kwalumuka’ yika chinalumbunuka?
13 Shina watamba kwivwa wika chinyengo ha yuma yize wa
...
a kuli Yehova.
24, 25. (a) Yika upapachiso unalumbunuka? (b) Yika mutulilongesa mu kapitulu wakasula?
25 Kulihana che muchikukwasa kukolesa usepa we ni Zambi. (Samu 25:14) Chino kuchishi kulumbunuka ngwo mutu makamulamwina ha mukunda wa upapachiso wenyi. Postolo Paulu yasoneka ngwenyi: “Manununenu ulamwino wa yenwene ni woma ni kuchikima.” (A-Fwilipu 2:12) Upapachiso uli wika uputukilo. Alioze kuchi muhasa kulifunga mu zango lia Yehova? Kapitulu wakasula wa mukanda uno makumbulula chihula chino.

Uno melu namavu vyafuma kulihi? Nyi likumbi, kakweji navatanganyika, navyuma vyavivulu vyahano hamavu vyejile ngachilihi? Mbimbiliya yakumbulula mwamuchano hakwamba ngwayo vyosenevi vavitengele kuli Kalunga. Shikaho mukanda wetu unaputuka navihande vyaMbimbiliya vyakuvuluka muvatengele vyuma.
Tweji kulinangula nge vatu alivangile Kalunga kutenga, vapwile vatu vakushipilitu chiwenya ikiye. Vapwile vangelo. Mavu vawatengelele vatu nge yetu. Kalunga atengele lunga napwevo valukile ngwavo Alama naEve nakuvahaka mumilemba yamwaza. Oloze kavononokele Kalungako, ngocho vajimbalishile lisesa vavahanyine lyakukatwama haya myaka yosena.
Kufuma hakutenga Alama swi nakuLivaji lyalinene, hahichile myaka 1,656. Mutando kaneyi mwapwilenga vatu vavapi vavavulu. Mwilu, mwapwile vatu vakushipilitu vakuhona kumona nameso, vaSatana navangelo jenyi vavapi. Hano hamavu, hapwile Kena navatu vakwavo vavapi, namalunga veka vapwile nge vikishikishi. Oloze hamavu hapwile navatu vamwaza nawa—Avele, Enoke naNowa. Vatu tunavuluka navyuma vyalingiwile natuvitanga muChihanda CHATETE.

“Atu eswe kakusakalala, alioze yami nakusakalala chinji kuhiana. Yino yakulingiwa mumu kuchishi ni kapinda umuwika. Kuli yuma yinji yize yakungupinjisa, ngwe kufunga mukwetu-lunga yoze wayiza musongo wa manyonga.”—Júlia. a
“Mukwetu-pwo kanguhichikile, chocho yingulela ana jetu ukawami. Chapwile chikalu chinji kuli yami. Chaluyinda, yingutokesa mulimo wami; chakapwile nawa ni mbongo ja kufweta hanga ngululieke mashinyi jami. Napwile ni yilemu yinji; chakapwile ni kumona yize mungulinga. Nanyingikine ngwami kulishiha yami mwe chili chipi, kashika yingwita kuli Zambi hanga ahwise kapinda wami.”—Barry.
Ngwe Júlia ni Barry, shina ha mashimbu amwe wakulivwa ngwe kusakalala chinasongwela mwono we? Nyi che wakwivwa, yikuma yili ha mukanda uno muyikukwasa. Tutalenu yimwe yuma yize yakututwala mba tusakalale ni chize kusakalala chakukwata hali yetu. Mutumona nawa chize mutuhasa kukumba kusakalala.

“Yetu twakuzanga, mumu iye waliangile kutuzanga.”—1 YOANO 4:19.
MIASO: 6, 138
1, 2. Kuchi Yehova anatulongesa kumuzanga?
JILA yipema yize umwe chisemi mahasa kulongeselamo ana jenyi, yili ha kwaasolwela chilweza chenyi mwene. Muze iye masolola zango hali ana jenyi, iye kanaalongesa chize atamba kusolola zango. Kukushi nawa niumwe yoze wakutuzanga chinji kuhiana Tata yetu Yehova. Kashika mutulilongesa chize twatamba kusolola zango “mumu iye waliangile kutuzanga.”—1 Yoano 4:19.
2 Mu jila yika Yeho
... 
ienyi kuli iye. Ndawichi yamba ngwenyi: “Maliji a mu kanwa liami, ni kupukuna cha mbunge yami chikapeme kumeso je, yena Yehova liwe liami, kanda Mukwa-Kungukula.”—Samu 19:1, 7, 14.
11. Kuchi mutuhasa kuzachisa chinyingi chize Yehova akutwaha hanga tusolole zango lietu hali iye? (Tala chizulie cha uputukilo)
11 Musono Yehova kanatulongesa yuma yinji hakutwala kuli iye, upale wenyi, yitangiwa yenyi, ni Liji lienyi. Atu anji hano hashi kakwaakolweza hanga alilongese, alioze shikola jinene-jinene ha
...
 ni mbunge ye yeswe; kanda ukajikijila ha malinjekela ja yena mwene. Ukamutayize mu yilinga ye yeswe mba iye makalulamisa majila je.”—Yishima 3:5, 6.
19. Kuchi mutusolola ngwetu twakuzanga Yehova?
19 Amu hanatuzanga chitangu, Yehova kakutulongesa chize mutuhasa kumuzanga. Mashimbu eswe tunyongenu ha yize akulinga hali yetu, ni chize iye akutuzanga chinji. Ha chino mutusolola ngwetu twakumuwayila ni mbunge yetu yeswe, ni mwono wetu weswe, ni kunyonga chetu cheswe ni ngolo jetu jeswe.—Marku 12:30.

Pwenu ni kwenda chenu chize chinate hakachi ka akwa mavungu. —1 Petu. 2:12.
Musono, tunamono kumanunuka cha uprofeto wa mu Mbimbiliya. Atu “a ku mavungu a malimi eswe” kanalilongesa limi lisandu lize linakatuka ha umwenemwene wa mu Mbimbiliya. (Zeka. 8:23; Zefa. 3:9) musono, atu kuhiana 8.000.000 mu yifuchi 240 kali mu ululikiso wa Yehova, nawa hita mwaka kakupapachisa tununu twa atu! Chuma chilemu hi unji wa atu ko, alioze yitanga ya ku Ukristu, chekwamba ‘utu waha’ uze akupwa nawo tumbaji wano
... 
lwelo wa kukomwesa uze Izaia, Ezekiele, Daniele ni Yoano amwene. Weswe wasolwele ngwo Yehova kali Mwanangana wa uhenya. Izaia kamwene ‘Yehova kanatwama ha ngunja mwilu.’ (Iza. 6:1-3) Ezekiele kamwene Yehova kanatwame ha temba lienyi mu malilu, liakujingilika ni ‘pangu lize liapwile ngwe kongolo.’ (Eze. 1:26-28) Daniele kamwene “Mukulu-wa-Matangwa” kali ni mazalo atoma, ngunja yenyi yapwile milengi ya kahia. (Danie. 7:9, 10) Nawa Yoano kamwene Yehova kanatwama ha ngunja yakujingilika ni kongolo y
...
i ni kukola, unalilongesa chikuma chino ku shikola. Hanji yize alongeshi je akwamba, muyihasa kupwa ngwe yamwenemwene kuli yena. Alioze, o hanji kanda achifupa kunyingika nyi Sakatanga kwe atwama. Iwuluka chiyulo chize chili ha Yishima 18:17, chinambe ngwo: “Yoze malianga kulisamba mamumona ngwe mukwa ululi, alioze mukwo meza ni kumusopesa.” Shimbu utayize yuma yeswe yize wakulilongesa ku shikola, watamba kulilongesa kanawa yize Mbimbiliya yakwamba ni yize yili mu mikanda yetu. w22.08 2 ¶2; 4 ¶8

1, 2. Muloñadi wuzweñi chiwukutwalekelahu munshakaminu yakaayi kamakonu?
MAKONU yuma mukaayi yinakali. Atwansi amavulu anakukeña nyidimu ilaña anakuyimona wanyi. Amavulu anakusha mawumi awu muwubanji kuhitila mukuya mumatuña mwekala maheta amavulu. Wuzweñi wudi kwejima nimumatuña mwekala maheta. Akweti maheta anakuhetelaku nawa abula maheta niwena anakuswejelaku kukabakana. Kwesejekeja nakusandujola kwakatataka, a
...

(Yish. 19:17) Yawaana yakuhana mukudikeñela yatukwashaña kwidisha nyikanda nikukwasha mudimu wakushimwina mumatuña mwekala wuzweñi ilaña mudi akwakushimwina amavulu. Hadi yaaka yayivulu, matuña adi neyi Congo, Madagascar niRwanda, amanakwetu azatishaña mali anateli kwesekana namali atambulañawu mumulungu hela hakakweji kumudimu kulanda yakuda yakukwasha chisaka hela kwikala namaBayibolu. Twamona nge vatu vavavulu vaze vetava lyehi veji kwivwanga kuwaha kushimutwila mijimbu yamuMbimbiliya. Twatachikiza ngwetu mutu himutu nahase kulisakwila kala liuka lyakwitava mwasaka, kaha nawa katweshi kushinjila vatu vevwilile kumujimbu wetuko.
Nge tuli nakushimutwila namutu uze etava lyehi, tweji kukavangiza mazu amuMbimbiliya nakushimutwila nenyi “namuchima wauvwovu” nakumusolwela “kalemesa chikuma.” (WaPetulu 1, 3:15)
Twejiva vene ngwetu vatu vamwe kaveshi kwitavila mujimbu tweji kwambululangako. (Mateu 10:14) Shikaho twatela kuhanjika navo numba tutachikize vatu navasaka chipwe vaze kaveshi nakusakako. Kaha nawa twejiva ngwetu chiyoyelo chavatu cheji kwalumukanga.

Munateli kwikala ñahi nvwali wamuwahi?
Neyi anvwali adikeña nikudilemesha, anyana akukula chiwahi. (Akolosi 3:14, 19) Anvwali amawahi akeña anyanawu nawa ayihamekaña, neyi chochahamekeliyi Yehova Nzambi Mwanindi.—Tañenu Matewu 3:17.
Tata yetu wamwiwulu watiyililaña ambuñindi, nawa washaña maana kuyuma yinakumulejawu. Anvwali niwena atela kumwimbujola nawa atela kutiya yuma yinakuhosha anyanawu. (Yakoba 1:19) Atela kwiluka yuma yinakutoñojoka anyanawu kushilahu niyuma yinakuyineñesha.—Tañenu Kuchinda 11:11, 15.
Munateli kukulisha ñahi anyana chiwahi?
Anvwali akweti wuswa wakutuña nshimbi. (Aefwesesa 6:1) Dizilenu kudi Nzambi. Wamwekeshaña kukeña kudi anyanindi kuhitila mukuyituñila nshimbi nikuyileja yuma yatama yinateli kufumamu neyi akañanya kuyilondela. (Kutachika 3:3) Chatela yayikanjikiji kulondela nshimbi, wayilejaña chiyatela kuhetelamu neyi ela yuma yayiwahi.—Tañenu Isaya 48:18, 19.
Ikalenu nachaaku chakuleja anyanenu kukeña Nzambi. Neyi mwila mwenimu akakoña yuma yayiwahi hela chakwila mudiku wanyi. Kufwana Nzambi wadizishaña kuhitila muyuma yelañayi, ninenu dizishenu anyanenu kukeña Nzambi kuhitila muyuma yimwelaña.—Tañenu Kuhituluka 6:5-7; Aefwesesa 4:32; 5:1.

Ha 19 dezembro 2023, ndumbu Vladimir Balabkin kapwa kufambwisa mu zuwo lia ususu muze te hatwama tukweji atatu ni ndambu. Ku uputukilo kamupatwilile ha miaka yiwana, chocho yamusa mu zuwo lia ususu ha 13 setembro 2023. Ndumbu Vladimir kakatayijile chiyulo chize akwachile ku chota cha usopelo. Ngaji atatu waze amupanjikile, yalumuna miaka ya upatwilo yize amuselele chitangu. Yatepulula miaka yiwana yize amuselele ni kumupatwila mwaka umuwika ku zuwo. Alioze te keshi ni ulite wa kulinga wenyi.
Ha mashimbu a usopeso wenyi ni hamu lieswe Vladimir yamba ngwenyi: “Ufulielo wami ni yuma yize nakutayiza yinakatuka mu liji lia Zambi. Mbimbiliya yakungukwasa kupwa ni yitanga yize Sakatanga akuzanga kumona kuli atu eswe ngwe, upeme, kulihumikiza, ni kusuula. Chino chakunguyukisa hamwe ni usoko wami. Ngunazange hanga atu eswe alilongese Mbimbiliya mumu chino muchihasa kwalumuna mwono wo hanga upwe upema.”
Tunawahilila chinji hamwe ni ndumbu Vladimir ni usoko wenyi. Chikwo nawa, tunanungu ni kwiuluka waze eswe achili mu mazuwo a ususu, ni kupwa ni shindakenyo ngwo Yehova maawahisa ha kunyongonona cho.—A-Hepreu 10:34

Yinyingikiso ya mu JW Library, muyikukwasa kufunga haze wasulila mu hita mukanda mutanga, ngwe yinyingikiso twakusa ha mikanda. Hita mukanda mu JW Library uli ni yinyingikiso 10.
Kaula usongwelo hakuzachisa yinyingikiso:
Kusa Chinyingikiso Chaha
Muhasa kusa chinyingikiso ha mutwe, kapitulu hanji versu ya Mbimbiliya.
Mba use chinyingikiso ha mutwe hanji kapitulu, pola ha mbutau Chinyingikiso. Yinyingikiso ya mikanda yahaliapwila muyisoloka. Pola ha umwe mutwe hanji kapitulu hanga use chinyingikis
... 
u pola ha sona, hi mupola ha mbutau Chinyingikiso cha mukanda, yili ha lifwo liacho.
Kuya ku Chinyingikiso
Mba uwane chinyingikiso unakasa, azulula mukanda uze uli ni chinyingikiso, hi pola mbutau Chinyingikiso. Mba hi pola chinyingikiso chize unazange.
Kuzachisa Yinyingikiso
Nyi hiwasa chinyingikiso, muhasa kuchichiza hanji kuchisalakanyisa.
Hakuchiza chinyingikiso, pola mbutau Chinyingikiso ni kupola nawa mbutau Yinji yili sali lia chinyingikiso chize unafupu kuchiza. Mba pola Jimuna.
Hakusala
...
Yinji yili hakamwihi ni chinyingikiso muzanga kusalakanyisa. Pola ha Salakanyisa. Chinyingikiso chaha muchisalakana chikulu. Chino muchikukwasa kufunga haze muzanga kutanga ha mashimbu akwo. Chakutalilaho, muhasa kufunga katalilo we wa kutanga Mbimbiliya.
Ayi yeswe kayifwambwishile mu Maio 2014 ni JW Library 1.4, yize yakukalakala ni Android 2.3 ni aplikativa jaha. Nyi yikuma yino kuwayimwene, kaula usongwelo uli mu “Putuka Kuzachisa JW Library—Android,” ha mutwe wakwamba ngwo Chiza Yikuma Yaha.

Muli mikanda yinji, ni tumikanda, mafwo, yinema yize muhasa kutanga hanji kutala ha JW Library chipwe kuushi internet.
Kaula uno usongwelo ha kuchiza ni kuhengwola Mikanda:
Chiza Mikanda
Muhasa kuchiza mikanda yinji nyi muzanga hanga utange ni kulilongesa.
Azulula ha unjililo ni kupola ha katalilo wa Mikanda hanga utale mikanda yize yiliho.
Pola ha mbotau ya Malimi hanga umone malimi waza ali ni mikanda. Sakula limi lize unazange. Limi lize wakuzachisa chinji liakusoloka chitangu ha katalilo. Mu
... 
i hanga utange.
Chihanda cha mikanda yakuchiza chakusolola mikanda yeswe yize hiwachiza mu limi lieswalio. Muhasa kuyilulieka kulita ni mutapu wayo, ngwe, yize wakutanga chinji, yize kushi kutanga chinji, hanji yize yinene chinji.
Jimuna Mikanda
Muhasa kujimuna mukanda uze kuwazangile nawa hanji hanga upwe ni chihela chinene mu utulikilo wa mikanda.
Azulula kasha ya usongwelo ni kupola ha Mikanda, mba hi pola ha mutapu wa mukanda unazange (ngwe, Mikanda) hanga mikanda yacho yisoloke. Nyi hiwawan
...
ilulieka chaha, azulula ha unjililo, pola ha Mikanda. Mba nyi kuli mikanda yili alulieka chaha, chilayi cha mikanda yacho muchisoloka. Pola chilayi chacho umone mikanda yacho. Pola ha mukanda hanga uchize waha hanji pola ha yeswe hanga uchize yeswe.
Ayi yeswe kayifwambwishile mu Fevereiro 2015 ni JW Library 1.4, yize yakukalakala ni Android 2.3 ni aplikativa jaha. Nyi yikuma yino kuwayimwene, kaula usongwelo uli mu “Putuka Kuzachisa JW Library— Android,” ha mutwe wakwamba ngwo Chiza Yikuma Yaha.

KAPOSHI WA KUTALILA— WAKULILONGESA
Setembro 2017
Mitwe ya kulilongesa ha Outubro 23 Novembro 26, 2017.
Ha shimbu limwe, Yehova kalisolwele mwene kuli Mose ha kumulweza jina lienyi ni yitanga yenyi. Chitanga chitangu chize Zambi atongwele chili keke. Chitanga chika chenacho, nawa mumu liaka twatamba kuchizanga?
Mbimbiliya ni halyapwila yichili umwe mukanda uze akulanjisa chinji, chize ku sekulu ya kunyima chipwe ha kwalumuna cha malimi, Kukola cha yuma ya mafwefwe nawa ha ukanjiso waku yilumbununa.

1. Wanangana Wa Zambi Yika?
Wanangana Wa Zambi uli wata wa mumalilu. Muukasalakana manguvulu eswe a hashi, hanga upale wa Zambi ulingiwe hano hashi chizechene ngwe mumalilu. Jino je sango jipema ja Wanangana wa Zambi. Kwasala hakehe Wanangana wa Zambi uyukise atu waze anafupu nguvulu mupema. Nawa muukachinga atu eswe waze makatwama hano hashi.
Wanangana weswe ukwete Mwata. Yehova hanasakula Mwanenyi, Yesu Kristu apwe Mwanangana mu Wanangana wenyi.

Luyinda munene kanakundama, kashika, twatamba kulinga mulimo wa kwambujola washi-washi. (Yishi. 24:11, 12, 20) Mba tukwase atu, mutuhasa kuzachisa cartão hanga twaasongwele ha Liji lia Zambi ni ha site yetu. Cartão wacho kali ni chilayi chinatwala ha chinema chakwamba ngwo, Mumu Liaka Chatamba Kulilongesa Mbimbiliya? ni papilo ya kwita sango jikwo hanji longeso lia Mbimbiliya. Atu amwe keshi kuzanga kutanga mikanda yetu, alioze kakuzanga kunjila ha site yetu. Kanda twecha kwaha cartão wa site yetu. Alioze kutwatambile kumuhana kuli atu waze keshi kusolola zango ha milimo yetu.
Muze muya ku milimo we, nyi wa wana mutu yoze wakuzanga kunyingika umwenemwene, muhasa kumulweza ngwe: “Ngunazange kukwaha chimwe chuma. Cartão au makusongwela ha site yize yili ni sango jinji nawa hali yinema ni yikuma yikwo.” (Yoa. 4:7) Cartão jacho kali akehe-akehe, kashika muhasa kumbata anji hanga utetele kuli atu waze muwana mu jila ni kuze unayi.

Yize twakufuliela yakukatuka mu Mbimbiliya. Kashika, Twakwalumuna yize twakufuliela muze twakunyingika kanawa Yisoneko. a
Kwalumuna cha amwe malongeso chize Yela ja Yehova akulinga, chinalite ni shimbi ya mu Mbimbiliya yize yili ha Yishima 4:18 yinambe ngwo: “Jila ya mukwa ululi yapwa ngwe kutemuka cha kucha; chakuliwezela tachi ndo tangwa ha muchima.” Ngwe chizechene tangwa liakutuhuka hakehe-hakehe ni kusolola hashi, Zambi neye kakutusolwela ulumbunwiso wa Yisoneko hakehe-hakehe ha mashimbu alita. (1 Petulu 1:10-12) Ngwe chize Mbimbiliya yaprofetezele, chino te muchilingiwa chinji ha ‘matangwa akusula.’—Daniele 12:4.
Kwalumuka chino kuchatambile kutukomwesa chipwe kutupinjisa. Tuvumbi twa Yehova akunyima no ha mashimbu amwe kapwile kunyonga ni kushimbwila yuma yeka, alioze kulutwe yamona ngwo te katamba kwalumuna manyonga jo.
Muze Mose akumbanyishine miaka 40, iye yalihana ngwe mukwa-kupulula A-Izalele shimbu te mashimbu alita a Zambi kanda aheta.—Yilinga 7:23-25, 30, 35.
Apostolo kakahashile kunyingika uprofeto uze te unatale ha kufwa ni uhindukilo wa Mesaya.—Izaia 53:8-12; Mateu 16:21-23.
Amwe Akwa-Kristu ku mashimbu akunyima kakapwile ni manyonga alita hakutwala ku “tangwa lia Yehova.”—2 A-Tesalonika 2:1, 2.
Kulutwe Zambi yaakwasa kunyonga mujila yalita, kashika ni yetu tunalembe hanga iye anunge ni kutukwasa.—Tiangu 1:5.

Kumbululo lia Mbimbiliya
Jita ya Armagedone yinalumbunuka jita yakasula ya Zambi ni manguvulu ja atu. Alioze musono, manguvulu jacho ni waze akwakwasa kakulimika ni Zambi ha kulituna kumwononokena. (Samu 2:2) Jita ya Armagedone muyikonwona manguvulu eswe a hashi.—Daniele 2:44.
Liji “Armagedone” liakusoloka kamuwika mu Mbimbiliya mu mukanda wa Usolwelo 16:16. Kupalikila mu umwe uprofeto, mukanda wa usolwelo unasolola ngwo “kuma kuze anavulukako mu Hepreu ngwo Armagedone,” “mianangana a yifuchi ye
... 
Kuyula 5:19, 20; 2 Mianangana 9:27; 23:29) Alioze, liji Armagedone kuyishi kulumbunuka wika chihela cha Megidu. Mumu ku chihela chacho kukushi mulundu unene. Chikwo nawa, chipwe kuchingako Yezerele chihela chize chapwila hakamwihi ni Megidu, muchipwa chikalu hanga eswe waze masa jita ni Zambi, kutamo. Kashika, liji Armagedone linalumbunuka kulichinga cha mianangana a hashi heswe hanga alimike ni wanangana wa Zambi.
Kuchi Zambi makasa jita ya Armagedone? Twanyingikine chize makazachisa ndundo jen
...
ba ngwetu, armagedone kumakaneha songo lia hano hashi.—Mateu 24:3.
Tangwa lika jita ya Armagedone muyikalingiwa? Ha kuhanjika hakutwala ku luyinda munene yoze makatwala ku jita ya Armagedone, Yesu kambile ngwenyi: “Alioze ha kutwala ku tangwa lize ni ola yize niumwe kayinyingike, chipwe angelo a mwilu ka, alioze Tata wika.” (Mateu 24:21, 36) Chipwe chocho, Mbimbiliya yakulongesa ngwo Armagedone muyikalingiwa ha mashimbu akuyula cha Yesu mu malilu, chize chaputukile ha mwaka 1914.—Mateu 24:37-39.

UKALU
Kachi nge munakushimutwila haukalu namuka-mahyenu, kutala mweji kupihililanga chikuma kuhambakana muze mwaputukanga kushimutwila tahi? Nge mukiko, kaha munahase kuhonesa ukalu kana. Chakulivanga, mwatela kutachikiza ngwenu malunga namapwevo valihandununa mujila veji kuhanjikilangamo vyuma. *

Kakavulu mapwevo vasaka kuhanjika haukalu shimbu kanda vawane mwakuukumishila. Shimbu jimwe, vamona kuhanjika nge hijila yakukumishilamo ukalu.

Shina hiunapu kama ni kapinda wa kwiwuluka chimwe chikuma chize walilongesele? Ha mashimbu amwe, yino yakulingiwa kuli yetu eswe. Yika muyihasa kukukwasa? Nyonga ha yikuma yilemu.
Muze unalilongesa, mana-mana ndambu hanga usoneke yikuma yilemu. Postolo Paulu kakwashile atu waze te matanga mikanda yenyi hanga akaule chikuma chino hakwamba ngwenyi: “Chino che chikuma chinene.” (Hepre. 8:1) Ni maliji wano, iye yakwasa atu waze te matanga mikanda yenyi akaule manyonga jenyi ni kunyingika chize hita chikuma chinakwate ha chikuma chinene hanji ngwetu chilemu.
Muhasa kusa amwe mashimbu hanyima lia longeso lie lia wika, hanji minuto kumi hanga unyonge hakehe ha yikuma yilemu yize walilongesa. Nyi wahashile kuyiuluka, konga nawa liso ha yikuma yilemu (kanji-kanji kapwa maliji atangu mu paragrafu) yize walilongesa. Nyi wachilinga, mukwasa manyonga je hanga afunge yize walilongesa. Nyi ngwe walilongesa chimwe chuma chaha, eseka kulumbununa chikuma chacho mu maliji je. Kuhengola yikuma yilemu, muchikwasa manyonga je ni kukukwasa hanga umone kanawa chize sango jacho mujikukwasa ku mwono we.

Wangana hiwangana watwama namutu uze apwa mwangana. Mwangana eji kuyulanga vatu vamungalila yenyi. Uno watachikiza mutu uze apwa Mwangana waWangana waKalunga tahi?— Apwa Yesu Kulishitu. Atwama mwilu. Kalinwaha apwenga Mwangana wavatu vosena hano hamavu. Unashinganyeka ngwove naukevwa kuwaha omu Yesu mwakapwa Mwangana hano hamavu tahi?—
Vyuma muka uli nakusaka kukalivwisa kuwaha muPalachise?
Tuvosena natukawahilila chikuma! Vatu vaze navakapwa muPalachise, kaveshi kukaliveta chipwe kulijiha mujijitako. Vatu vosena navakalizanga navakwavo. Kakweshi mutu mwakaviza chipwe kufwako. Tupuputa navakavatonesa meso, tujika matwitwi navakevwa, vitonji navakatambuka, kaha navakevwa kuwaha chikuma. Mutu himutu mwakapwa navyakulya vyavivulu. Tunyama nawa kaveshi kukajiha vatuko, kaha natukahema navo. Vatu vaze vafwa navakasanguka nakuyoya cheka. Vatu vaze tunashimutwila mumukanda uno vakufwana nge Laveka, Lahave, Ndavichi, naElija navakivo navakasanguka. Unakusaka ukavamone omu navakasanguka tahi?—

Yela ja Yehova kakulikungulwila mu yihela ya uwayilo yize avuluka ngwo Mazuwo a Wanangana, kaali ha poso. Yika yakulingiwa ha kukunguluka chacho? Mumu liaka chili chipema kuya ha kukunguluka chacho?
Achinyonga ha chilweza chino: Nyi wawana umwe mushete ukulu, muze muli upite, shina kuchi kuzanga kuwazulula? Mbimbiliya yili ngwe, mushete uze uli ni upite unji. Yili ni yuma yinji yize muyihasa kukukwasa.

1. Shina yikungulwila yeswe yili ya umwenemwene nyi?
Alioze mu mangeleja anji muli atu apema. Zambi kakumona atu jacho kashika kakwanyonga. Alioze anji kanase mangeleja kulutwe hanga alinge upi. (2 A-Korindu 4:3, 4; 11:13-15) Nyikulita ni akwa sango ja yisaji, mangeleja anji kakukwasa kulinga upupilo, utoji, jita nawa ni utanji kuli twanuke. Yino yuma yinanehe chinyengo chinji kuli waze anafuliela Zambi ni umwenemwene!
Chikungulwila cha umwenemwene chinalemesa Zambi, alioze chikungulwila cha mah
... 
e yikulu kulutwe lia matangwa ja Noe, mwenamo mwaputukile chikungulwila cha mahuza. Kwasala hakehe Zambi ahwise yikungulwila yeswe ya mahuza ize yinapinjisa ni kwonga atu.
Kuli nawa sango jikwo jipema. Yehova keshi kuvulama atu a umwenemwene waze anamwangashana mu yikungulwila yeswe ya mahuza. Iye kanakungu atu jacho hanga aalongese umwenemwene.
3. Atu apema yika chaatamba kulinga?
Yehova kakunyonga atu waze akuzanga umwenemwene ni upeme. Iye kanalweze atu jacho hanga afambuke kawashi mu yikungu

4. Kuchi Zambi makaneha chiseke hashi heswe?
Kwiza cha upatwilo wa yikungulwila ya mahuza je sango jipema. Mumu upatwilo wacho muukaneha ukwaso hashi heswe kuli waze anapinji. Yikungulwila ya mahuza yichi kwonga nawa atu chipwe kwahandununa. Eswoo makapwa ni mwono wa mutolo, maakakungulula mu uwayilo wa Zambi wamwenemwene umuwika.

Mulimo wetu wakwambulula veji kuukundwiza kuhichila mumawana veji kuhananga mukulisakila kuli Vinjiho jaYehova. Katweshi kufwetesa jimbongo hakukunguluka chetuko, chipwe kufweta vyuma vyakusokesa mulikumiko. (Mateu 10:7, 8) Oloze kuvihela vyakulemesela tweji kuhakangako vikasha, kaha nge mutu nasake kuhana mawana eji kuhaka muze muvikasha. Vaze veji kuhananga wana kaveshi kulweza vatu wana navahanako.
Tweji kuzachisanga jimbongo jetu kanawa, mwomwo katweshi kufweta vatwamina jetuko. Kaha nawa Vinjiho jaYehova kaveshi kuvafweta jimbongo omu veji kuyanga kuzuvo hizuvoko, vihela vyetu vyakulemesela nawa vyapwa vyaunyoji.
Mawana aze veji kutumanga kujiofesi jamitango jaVinjiho jaYehova veji kuwazachisanga kukukafwa vandumbwetu vaze vali muukalu wakulijila, nakukafwa vamishonali, natulama vakutambwojoka, nakutungisa jizuvo jakulemesela Kalunga, nakupulita jiMbimbiliya namikanda yeka yahanjika haMbimbiliya nakuyitwala kuvikungulwilo.
Mutu himutu eji kuhana wana mukulizangila numba upwa wakukafwa hachikungulwilo atwama chipwe kumulimo wamukaye kosena. Chikungulwilo hichikungulwilo cheji kuvilikanga mawana veji kupwanga nawo.

1. Mwomwo ika Kalunga atangilile mavu?
Yehova ahanyine mavu kuli malunga namapwevo. Hano hamavu hakiko hembo lyetu. Ngocho, valunga napwevo vakulivanga vaAlama naEve kavavatengele mangana vakazalise mwiluko, mwomwo Kalunga te hanatenge lyehi vangelo vakuyoyelanga mwilu. (Yopa 38:4, 7) Oloze Kalunga ambachile mutu watete nakumuhaka mupalachise yamwaza yize vavuluka ngwavo milemba yaEtene. (Kuputuka 2:15-17) Yehova amuhanyine ikiye navana venyi lutalililo lwakukalivwisanga lika kuwaha kuyoya chaku
... 
a cheka vatu vakayoye ngana muze ajinyine hakavanga.—Tangenu Samu 37:11, 34.
3. Uno Palachise navakayikindulwisa ngachilihi?
Mavu nawakapwa cheka palachise omu Yesu mwakayula kupwa Mwangana waWangana waKalunga. Mujita vavuluka ngwavo Alamangetone, Yesu mwakatetekela vangelo jaKalunga vakanongese vosena vaze veji kufumbukilanga Kalunga. Kufumaho, Yesu mwakakasa Satana hamyaka 1000. Vatu jaKalunga navakayovoka mwomwo Yesu mwakavatetekela nakuvakinga. Navakalivwisa kuwaha kuyoya chahaya myaka yosen
...
kivo navakapwa muPalachise. (WaYowano 1, 2:17) Yesu atumine vaka-kumukavangiza vatondetonde vatu nakuvanangula vyuma vatela kulinga numba Kalunga avetavile. Makumbi ano, Yehova ali nakunangula mamiliyoni avatu vakayoye muPalachise hano hamavu. (Zefwanyiya 2:3) Vatu veji kuyanga kujiZuvo jaWangana jaVinjiho jaYehova nakulinangula mwakupwila malunga, namapwevo, navisemi vamwaza. Visemi navana vavo veji kulemeselanga hamwe Kalunga nakulinangula mwakunganyalila kumujimbu wamwaza.—Tangenu Mika 4:1-4.

KAPOSHI WA KUTALILA N.º 1 2023 | Kupwa Kanawa Ku Manyonga—Ukwaso wa Mbimbiliya
Hashi heswe, yikola ya mu manyonga yinapinjisa tununu ni tununu twa atu. Akweze, tushinakaji, pichi hanji yiswale, waze alilongesa chinji hanji ka, atu a ku minyachi yalisa ni a mu uwayilo wa lisa kanapalika mu kapinda wacho. Yikola ya mu manyonga yika, nawa kuchi yakupinjisa atu? Kaposhi yono malumbununa ulemu wa kufupa uwukiso walita wa mandotolo ni chize Mbimbiliya muyihasa kukwasa waze anayiji.
Yikola ya mu manyonga muyihasa kupinjisa atu a mutapu weka ni weka ni miaka yeka ni yeka. Tala chize usongwelo wa mu Mbimbiliya muuhasa kukwasa waze anayiji yikola ya mu manyonga.
Shina yena muhasa kulemba kuli Zambi hakutwala ku manyonga waze anakupinjisa hanji yipikalo yeswawo? Kuchi kulemba muchihasa kukwasa waze anapinda ni yikola ya manyonga?
Sango ja mu Mbimbiliya ja malunga ni mapwo waze apwile ni kupinda ni manyonga ngwe yetu mujihasa kutukwasa tuhone kulivwa ngwe tuli ukawetu muze tunapinda ni yikola ya mu manyonga.

VYUMA YAHANJIKA MBIMBILIYA
OMWO MUNAHASE KUNGANYALA
UNO TWATELA CHIKUPU KUFWELELA VYUMA YAHANJIKA MBIMBILIYA TAHI?
Eyo, mwomwo yavishina vino vivali:
Yesu asolwele vyuma naukatesamo Wangana waKalunga. Yesu anangwile vaka-kumukavangiza valombenga Wangana waKalunga wizenga nakulomba nawa mwaya muchima waKalunga mulingiwe hano hamavu. (Mateu 6:9, 10) Yesu asolwele omu kulomba kana navakachikumbulula.
Omu Yesu apwile hano hamavu, alishile vatu vapwile nazala, okile vaveji, nakusangula vafu. (Mateu 15:29-38; Yowano 11:38-44) Hakupwa Mwangana waWangana waKalunga, Yesu alingile vyuma vyamwaza vize Wangana naukalingila vatu vakwononoka.—Kusoloka 11:15.
Ukalu uli nakusoloka mukaye wasolola nge Wangana waKalunga kalinwomu wizenga. Yesu ahanjikile chimweza ngwenyi shimbu kanda ou Wangana unehe kuunda hano hamavu, hano hakaye nahakapwa jijita, jizala jakalombolombo, namindenda.—Mateu 24:3, 7.
Ukalu kanou tuli nakuumona makumbi ano. Ngocho, twafwelela chikupu ngwetu Wangana waKalunga kalinwomu ukumise ukalu kana.
